ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Twisting Anthem and Warsong.
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm no, Attack (ATK) is not your attack speed but your Combat (offensive) skill.  ATK is raised by strength.  The strength component of warsong and anthem
ygData.messageBody:
Umm no, Attack (ATK) is not your attack speed but your Combat (offensive)
skill. ATK is raised by strength. The strength component of warsong and
anthem stacks. The Attack speedup (Haste) portion does not.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Peck White" <pwhite@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2000 10:12 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Twisting Anthem and Warsong.


> From: Peck White <pwhite@...>
>
> On Rokenn's Site it states that the speed component of Anthem and Warsong
> will not stack. I ran a little experiment last night and here are the
> results. I was naked at the time CT will do that to you.
>
> No Songs: Attack - 275
>
> Anthem: Attack - 290
>
> Warsong: Attack - 290
>
> Both Woven: Attack - 303
>
> So it looks like even the speed components do stack, but only partially.
>
> Tomerrilin Loreweaver
>
